org.jboss.windup.graph

Interface GraphListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArchiveIdentificationGraphChangedListener, ArchivePackageNameIdentificationGraphChangedListener, FileMappingGraphChangedListener

    public interface GraphListener
    This is used to get a callback whenever changes occur to the graph.
    Author:
    Jesse Sightler

    • Method Summary

      This should be called whenever a vertex property is updated.
